TopicTitle: Grand Tour (currently 0.242) Heavily Modded YT Series

Articles.Content:
Hey folks,

I have been making this series for a while, and realised I hadn't actually mentioned it on the forum...

So here it is:

http://goo.gl/HjOq5c

If anyone has a suggestion for a mod that isn't already being shown, or indeed is the dev of a mod and wants me to show it off, then let me know! If I can get it working then I'll show it off.

K.

***
